Textile

We provide a wide range of garments, from everyday essentials to high-fashion pieces, tailored to meet diverse market demands and consumer preferences.

Machinery

Our state-of-the-art machinery enhances production efficiency and quality, encompassing everything from spinning and weaving equipment to advanced sewing and finishing machines.

Spare Parts

To keep your operations running smoothly, we supply a full range of spare parts for all types of textile machinery, ensuring minimal downtime and sustained productivity.

Raw Materials

Atex Trading Limited is a newly founded company, bringing a fresh and innovative approach to the trade of raw materials and industrial machinery. Our mission is to connect high-quality suppliers with industries in need, ensuring seamless transactions and exceptional service.
